content: pointelle tie scarf pointelle tie scarf about this neck scarf is inspired by the classic silk square scarfs that look oh so chique and make every outot look so much more elevated it9s also a super quick knit 3 perfect for in between big projects or as an easy project on the side for car rides this would also make a cute and afordable present since it uses very minimal yarn the scarf has points that widen then come in for the part where you tie the knot so it9s not super bulky and then increase again to the original width for the part that goes around your neck the icord edges that are knit simultaneously give it a polished look it9s knit in a super easy to remember lace pattern that gives the scarf a cottage core look gauge 27 stitches x 32 row in lace pattern yarn knitting for olive merino & soft silk mohair you9ll need approximately half a ball each needles 4 mm us 6 measurements 10 x 105 cm after blocking abbreviations sl = slip pw = purl wise k = knit p = purl k2tog = knit two together kfb = knit front and back rs = right side ws = wrong side wyif = with yar n in front yo = yarn over pointelle tie scarf instructions cast on 7 stitches with your preferred cast on method leave a long enough tail to be able to connect the icord edges see onishing follow the chart from the arrow ÿ in chart 1 and work your way up first row is a knit row as indicated on the left of the chart where you begin the increases the pink border is the icord edge on the rs you knit the orst stitch then slip the next one pw with the yarn in front of the stitch pay attention not to accidentally do a yarn over and then knit the third stitch on the ws you always slip the orst and last stitch pw with the yarn in front of the stitch only the second stitch is a knit stitch from the orst row on you will see how the stitches appear so it9s easy to remember what to do note purl row don9t have any increases decreases or lace pattern so besides the icord edge there is nothing you have to pay attention to once you have onished chart 1 go to chart 2 and again start from the arrow and work your way up the lace pattern in the orange boxed area is knit a total of 2 times you will have worked 32 row after that you9ll do the decreases for the tie section the tie section itself has a total of 14 row which alternate between knit and purl row now you9ll increase again and knit the
